body_content.explanation: a virus spread to people by a bite from an infected mosquito (= a type of small flying insect) that causes fever and pain, especially in the joints (= places in the body where bones join, such as the shoulder or the knee):
examples: Mosquitos that carry diseases such as dengue and chikungunya are being found in new parts of Europe.
He became so sick after catching chikungunya that he could not stand up.
The most common symptoms of chikungunya virus are fever and joint pain.
